irp:protocol.name: NEC1-y1
irp:protocol.irp:documentation: Variant of the NEC1 protocol with the checksum in byte 4 different (complement all of F except the MSB).

irp:protocol.name: NEC1-y2
irp:protocol.irp:documentation: Variant of the NEC1 protocol with the checksum in byte 4 different (complement all of F except the LSB).

irp:protocol.name: NEC1-y3
irp:protocol.irp:documentation: Variant of the NEC1 protocol with the checksum in byte 4 different (complement all of F except MSB and LSB).

irp:protocol.name: Tivo unit=0
irp:protocol.irp:documentation: Kludge protocol for compatibility with DecodeIR and irdb.
